posts.post_title: For Sale: T3 Clark Griffith PSA 5
posts.post_content:
Have the following T3 Clark Griffith for sale. Asking $1600 delivered in US. Payment - check, postal money order, or Paypal friends & family. Regular Paypal, add an additional 3% to cover the fees. First to commit to purchase gets the card. Any questions, please let me know. 

Thanks
DJ
